body.name: LINSY HOME 6 Drawers Dresser for Bedroom, Wood Bedroom Dresser Modern Drawer Chest, 6 Chest of Drawer, Tall Dresser for Closet, Dressers Organizer for Living Room, Closet, Hallway
features: 【Premium Material】:Made of P2 Grade Board, which is not only more cost-effective, but also environmentally sustainable. Our dresser features premium metal slides that glide smoothly and are built to last. The surface is coated with easy-to-clean and environmentally friendly paint.

【Refined Craftsmanship】 Different from the surface sticker craftsmanship, LINSY HOME storage drawer adopts full edge-sealing craftsmanship. Strictly edge-sealed panels not only make the drawer feel smoother, but also are less prone to breakage and have better durability.

【Space Saving】With 6 spacious drawers measuring 20.7” L x 13” W x 4.7” H, our dresser is perfect for storing adorable blankets, diapers, and more. We've added additional corner blocks to make it sturdier and long-lasting.
【 Smooth Glide】 Our premium metal slides make opening the drawers a breeze. Say goodbye to stuck or squeaky drawers!

【Anti-Falling】Anti-falling accessory included preventing injury from unexpected tipping of furniture. The back of the Drawer dresser is also equipped with a stabilizing device, which makes the dresser more stable and durable.

Q1: Where could I get the instruction manual A: Instruction manual is included on the package and you can also download the PDF version on the product page. Q2: What is assembly like? Easy/difficult? Most challenging parts? What tools are required and how many hands? A: Assembly is straightforward, but there are quite a few pieces which makes it SEEM more daunting. The six drawer boxes need to be assembled. You will need flat head and Phillips head screwdrivers and a hammer. And two will make it go faster! Q3: What is the dimension of the dresser? 15.67"D x 26.65"W x 42.68"H Q4: What is the dimension of the drawer? A: The dimensions of the drawer is 11.8"D x20.8"W x 8.7"H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice looking dresser!
reviews.reviewText: Now that I’ve finally put the dresser together by myself (it took me about 5 hours and the manufacturer suggests having two people do it), I can comment on the assembly process. Note that I didn’t have power tools. The instructions were actually very good with very clear concise drawings. And I never had an issue where maybe a hole was drilled in one place when it should’ve been drilled in a different place and it affected the assembly, or pieces were out of alignment or something. So the manufacturing of the parts was well done for the most part.As I mentioned, it took quite a while to do this myself. Power tools would’ve sped things up, however since the wood is a sort of particle board, power tools can have a tendency to over torque screws and rip and crack particle board, so I’d maybe advise against it. No real cons to be honest. A couple of strange design choices by the manufacturer though. One of them was they augured strips of lines into a couple of the backboards of the dresser, however these augured lines are never seen because the boards that they’re on face inward towards the middle of the dresser and so are hidden. Not even when you open the drawers do you see them. And so they served no purpose. Idk just seemed weird and pointless to me. There was another instance where holes were drilled on a board but they were never used. I know this might sound like I read the instructions wrong, however in both the drawings and the description they never use the holes for anything. Ultimately you never see them as again they’re facing inward towards the middle of the dresser. Anyway, in spite of the augured strips in the wood and holes that serve no purpose, the dresser looks very nice all the way around. The pieces were packaged very well too with lots of padding. I actually had about a 6 inch gash on the packaging box that dug in about half an inch deep, however it never touched any of the pieces of the dresser because they were packaged so well with lots of styrofoam. I actually ended up buying two of these dressers, however have only put one together so far. If there are any cons with the second dresser as I start putting it together I’ll update this review. But overall I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy dresser!!
reviews.reviewText: Very good dresser!! Took about 2hours to build with easy to follow picture instructions and pre drilled holes also comes with a spare parts bag. once I got built I was not disappointed! This dresser is really nice and heavy duty! I would highly recommend this and give more than 5stars! Also came with a drawer divider, bumpers for the edges, and 2 different kinds of mounting hardware for the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is very nice, has a lot of space, and not to hard to put together its very nice quality and dosen't scratch easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The fact that it has 5 drawers
reviews.reviewText: The dresser wasn’t to hard to put together but it did take me a little time. You have to be careful when screwing the screws in because you’ll mess the wood up. It’s pretty sturdy for the price and the look is amazing. I love the fact they put a little compact tray in for socks or something.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty decent small dresser
reviews.reviewText: Great little dresser! Took a bit of time for me to put together but I managed on my own. Using for 7 year old room. Wish it was just a bit larger
